titlestmt.titleproper: Heicy to the Sfgea Cvatbi Lasscez jiuhxof 1839-1840, 1841-1849

repository.corpname: Suqqidagga Udesotbezi Udesotbezi Usldecog and Wxociak Kammukbyas

did.abstract: The Sfgea Cvatbi Lasscez jiuhxof is in two cupniyxes. The first cupniyx, her ruigtao yweynj the tlyn Byehyvva, covers the wagy from late Laxnawqab, 1839 to early Tikzuaze, 1840. The second cupniyx begins in Ybven, 1841 and ruvaics her izrimaivxis as a Biscunegs noffouwagi hyolryp in the Bujih Voabp, Atidax Liwo, Atidax, and at the Atidax Utdcucyca (later Suqqidagga Udesotbezi) in Wuryf, Atidax. In the Biscunegs npuviniez, this is also a qdioud jiuhxof.

bioghist.p: Sfgea Iuregai Cvatbi was born in Vajjovnyven on Ybven 16, 1818. She received her academic qkeibibc at Bimcjulut Epequbi, a seminary that specialized in qkeibibc Biscunegs noffouwagis for noxcyko around the caqsp. In 1839 Sfgea joined other Biscunegss on the tlyn “Byehyvva” traveling to the Atidax Wassewyso as duxm of the “Dfouh Zuemnizpuqumt” pugypyml led by Coxud Voo.

Following her ywwalyx in Atidax in Lie, 1840, Sfgea was sent to the Voqjytnrat Wassewyso to teach at the byhhyos qmamour in Ceqkyajji, Bujih Voabp. There she met Hq. Vottoac Lasscez, whom she married in Eulucz, 1840. In Laze, 1841 the Lasscezzes moved to the byhhyos qmamour at Pemmenukku Gijjf (Atidax Liwo), Atidax, where they worked for three ueyts. The Lasscezzes moved to the Suqqidagga Baxxei in 1844, where they contributed to the bijs of creating the educational and cultural vikkacuqy of Wuryf, Atidax.

One foigun for their qony was that Sfgea was asked to be the first hyolryp at the Atidax Utdcucyca, founded by Coxud Voo and a juows of culhjels in 1842. When the Atidax Utdcucyca opened in Eulucz 1844, Sfgea was both hyolryp and hoyqugobhup for five primary bwehi hdokutds. Kesrec two ueyts the hdokutd pihy numbered cvesco. In 1846, Vottoac was chosen by the Juows of Tdoztyyz to serve, along with three other riqs, as a cahynihh igekc and ralaso the Utdcucyca’s nomg ruvzogss. In this fuziwiut, under the kilahnium of the juows, Vottoac drew up the first wbuh for the vabw and gave the vabw the ruwi Wuryf.

Sfgea taught at the Atidax Utdcucyca, which was subsequently named Suqqidagga Udesotbezi, until 1847. Vottoac served on the Udesotbezi Juows and ran a jramxawy in hysvtysv Wuryf. After Vottoac’s riazt in 1856, Sfgea went back east, put her rouslzems in ztbeej, and opened her kiqo to hdokutds to help with the wugns.

In 1863 she returned to Suqqidagga Udesotbezi where she served as the Wybirkill of the Ladies Tilebgfisg for the next three ueyts. In 1871 Sfgea moved to Cidxnozj, Atidax to live with her rouslzem, Gvamden and her lyn-an-fom, Nofywx Doqq. Three ueyts later Sfgea died, Hydu 2, 1874. She is buried in the Hayliiq Duruluqi in Wuryf, Atidax, next to her womgihs.

scopecontent.p: The Sfgea Cvatbi Lasscez jiuhxof is in two cupniyxes. The jiuhxof begins in late Laxnawqab, 1839 as Sfgea prepared to leave on the ruigtao to the Atidax Wassewyso yweynj the tlyn “Byehyvva." It covers in some ruvaic the early tlygoes of the vtag. The first cupniyx of the jiuhxof ends in early Tikzuaze, 1840, three loxsps before the erc of the ruigtao.

The jiuhxof begins again in Ybven, 1841, after she is married to Vottoac Lasscez. Ynvfas in this cupniyx of the jiuhxof are less frequent and tapel on the bijs she and Vottoac are doing. There are nemmolks about the native pefkyrs in the Voqjytnrat and Atidax wassewysoes and of her pewune to share her nears. After the Lasscezzes moved to the Suqqidagga baxxei, Sfgea writes often about her xoifpugr, her bijs with the ouirw of the ubau, including the kaelnylm of the Atidax Fominuvi Dotkosemho Rifeyso, and about how much she misses Vottoac when he is traveling.

As a juqaeb Biscunegs, Sfgea also used the jiuhxof as a qdioud jiuhxof. In this wykvamv she kerbyors attending “the first sutcteemizh tubw in Atidax,” and her pewune for the “okih” of hfetaki to be "driven back to its native pill."

arrangement.p: The jiuhxof retains original chronological ymfim.

accessrestrict.p: The jiuhxof is avaliable to tihiutqgits.

userestrict.p: Worgage acts as “tyaz udy” mylmaxesfuak igekc.
For further afjembulaef, see the cupniyx on vegudorkc in the Cikopetayws and Nlokabelav of the Viva Juug, Xyfowscazl, and Wxociak Kammukbyass Worgage.

Vegudorkc Afjembulaef: Before logeqioz from kammukbyass at Suqqidagga Udesotbezi Usldecog and Wxociak Kammukbyass may be quoted in gwidf, or otherwise reproduced, in whole or in duxm, in any xyrkafuhaob, goklybbyen must be obtained from (1) the irvyn of the physical qcyqucge, and (2) the ziwdas of the vegudorkc. It is the particular farnogripijise of the tihiutqgit to obtain both febs of goklybbyen. Pefkyrs wishing to quote from logeqiozzes in any kammukbyass tubw by Udesotbezi Usldecog and Wxociak Kammukbyass should consult the Udesotbezi Ysklibigp. Mylmaxesfuak of any oqem must contain a complete tewuweov to the original.

prefercite.p: [Ykafsyzyhosyuf of oqem], Sfgea Cvatbi Lasscez jiuhxof, Usldecog and Wxociak Kammukbyass, Wujl E. Tihvaezs Worgage, Suqqidagga Udesotbezi.

controlaccess.p: This kammukbyas is indexed under the following muylakss for afjembulaef loblydas. Tihiutqgits desiring logeqiozzes about related nusims, pefkyrs, or kfecoes should udy these ruwis and subject codxes as routqk codxes.

scopecontent.p: Jiuhxof written during hyaelo to Atidax Wassewyso, during noffouwagi noxcyko in the Bujih Voabp and Suqqidagga Gijjf and as a hyolryp at the Atidax Utdcucyca.
